short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape and Save products from Shopify store to csv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Assistant scrapes products from Shopify stores and save to CSV file.

Shopify Assistant features:
* Scrape thousands of products within minutes
* Rearrange product fields
* Filter by product published time
* Remove html tag in product description
* All product images url added to the CSV
* Does not require excessive permissions
